subject: RE: [junit] XMLUnit: Namespace prefixes in XPaths
msgSnippet: ... Associating namespaces to prefixes is pretty inconvenit in xpath, it looks ugly for complex queries :) There is a way to specify namespace uri in an xpath
messageBody:
> I'm trying to use XMLUnit to check SOAP messages. There I'm stuck with
> the problem that most everything in such a message has a namespace
> prefix. Now I'm looking for a way to associate namespaces to prefixes
> in an XPath query.
>
> Michael
>

Associating namespaces to prefixes is pretty inconvenit in xpath, it looks
ugly for complex queries :)
There is a way to specify namespace uri in an xpath query, you may find this
link useful
http://www.stylusstudio.com/SSDN/default.asp?action=9&read=3074&fid=23

_
Anton S.
